overview.name: Overview
overview.title: Reduce SaaS spaghetti & ship faster with PostHog
overview.description:
Replace 10+ devtools with PostHog, the all-in-one solution. Give your engineers all the context they need in one place – without having to juggle multiple contracts and wrestling with broken data pipelines.

  • A single source of truth for product data
  • Slash vendor costs and complexity
  • Focus the team on building features, not babysitting integrations

error_tracking.name: Error Tracking
error_tracking.title: Rank bugs by business impact
error_tracking.description:
Error Tracking is infused with business context. You can identify which issues kill conversions and which ones just clutter your logs.

It's built for product engineers who need to prioritize fixes based on revenue impact, not just error volume.

feature_flags.name: Feature Flags
feature_flags.title: Ship features without begging the data team
feature_flags.description:
Deploy to user segments and watch real business metrics change in real-time. Get user feedback instantly through integrated Surveys.

No waiting weeks for custom dashboards or statistical analysis - everything you need is already built in.

experiments.name: Experiments
experiments.title: Run statistically significant experiments
experiments.description:
Split experiences between users and let our statistical engine tell you definitively when you have a winner. Then roll it out to everyone with confidence.

No more "let's run it for another week" meetings where nothing gets decided.

cdp.name: CDP
cdp.title: Build your data infrastructure once
cdp.description:
We handle all the ETL, transformations, and real-time streaming as you scale.

No hiring data engineers, no managing vendor integrations that break at 2 AM.

Just product engineers building products, like it should be.

llm_analytics.name: LLM Analytics
llm_analytics.title: Stop wasting money on AI models that don't work
llm_analytics.description:
See exactly how users interact with your AI features and which models deliver actual results versus expensive disappointments.

Monitor costs across providers so you can optimize spend based on real performance data.

pricing.name: Pricing
pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: PostHog offers usage-based pricing. This means you only pay for what you use, and you can set billing limits so you never get an unexpected bill.

cta.name: Get a demo
cta.title: Get a demo
cta.description: No demos required – you can try PostHog without ever talking to us. But if you'd like personalized demo, book a time.
